contents.text: Thank you for calling Segment in San Francisco, the analytics platform that unblocks every team from engineering to product to marketing.
For sales inquiries and licensing information, press 1.
To speak with our sales team about new licenses or demos, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to a sales representative.

navigationGoals: Arrange a demo and discuss enterprise licensing options
I want to discuss licensing options and schedule a demo for my team.
Purchase additional developer seats and confirm API throughput limits.
I want to add more user seats to my account and find out the pricing options.
I would like to request a demo license to evaluate the analytics platform for my experimental data processing.

contents.text: For questions about billing or your existing account, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our billing department.

navigationGoals: Dispute a billing charge and request an updated invoice
I need to review my latest invoice and update my billing information.
Clarify last invoice discrepancies and adjust my billing plan.
I’m confused about a recent charge on my invoice and need someone to explain it.
I need assistance reviewing my current account charges and updating my billing information.

contents.text: For customer support and technical assistance, press 2.
If you need help with integrations or implementation, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to technical support.

navigationGoals: Get help configuring the Segment integration with our marketing stack
I need help implementing Segment with our existing tech stack.
Debug my SDK integration for real-time event streaming errors.
I need help installing the tracking code on my website—I’m not sure where to paste it.
I need technical support configuring the integration of your API with my lab’s data acquisition system.

contents.text: For product feedback or to speak with customer success, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our customer success team.

navigationGoals: Provide feedback on the product and discuss adoption best practices
I want to provide feedback on the product and learn best practices for our use case.
Offer feedback on the new data governance UI and request best-practice guidelines.
I’d like to share my feedback on the platform and get advice on best practices.
I would like to provide feedback on the product and discuss how it could better support academic research workflows.
